project.description1: Commercial landing page, designed & built from scratch for the client. Modern, clear & very fast; developed with the foundations set for ease of growth. Features custom contact form validation and instant language translations.

about.description: I'm Chris Perrault, a full stack developer from Montr√©al with a unique path to tech. I spent over 15 years as a professional cook before discovering my love for programming, which led me to graduate with honors from John Abbott College's Full Stack program. Today, I thrive in freelance work and stay active in programming communities, both online and at local events. I'm all about building, learning, and sharing my skills with others.
